title: Understanding Binge $$\frac{Eating}{Purging}$$ Type Anorexia
text: Binge $$\frac{eating}{purging}$$ type anorexia involves episodes of binge eating followed by compensatory behaviors. Can you think of what these behaviors might be?

title: Compensatory Behaviors
text: Compensatory behaviors are actions taken to counteract the effects of binge eating. What are some common methods used in this type of anorexia?

hintAnswer: binge eating is followed by purging through $$self-induced$$ vomiting or misuse of laxitives, diuretics, or enemas to achieve weight loss
title: Identifying Purging Methods
text: What are some methods used to purge after binge eating in this type of anorexia?
choices: binge eating is followed by purging through $$self-induced$$ vomiting or misuse of laxitives, diuretics, or enemas to achieve weight loss
$$self-induced$$ vomiting or misuse of laxitives, diuretics, or enemas to achieve weight loss
